featured.text: The Paralympic Games have always been held in the same year as the Olympic Games.
The number of athletes 28 in the Summer Paralympic Games has increased from 400 athletes from 23 countries in 1960 to 3,806 athletes from 136 countries in 2004.

definition.zh_def: 殘奧會的，與殘疾運動員相關的
definition.en_def: Relating to the Paralympics, an international multi-sport event for athletes with disabilities.
definition.example: She trained hard to compete in the Paralympic Games.
